DbDetails.DbTable: vtigercrm6.vtiger_assets v left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_assetstatus v0 on v.assetstatus=v0.assetstatusid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_products v1 on v.product=v1.productid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_invoice v2 on v.invoiceid=v2.invoiceid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_account v3 on v.account=v3.accountid left join vtigercrm6.contacts_v c on v.contact=c.contactid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_carrier v4 on v.shippingmethod=v4.carrierid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_users v5 on v.created_by=v5.id left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_users v6 on v.last_update_by=v6.id
DbDetails.Data: v.assetname,v0.assetstatus assetstatus,v1.productname product,v.asset_no,v.serialnumber,v2.subject invoiceid,v3.accountname account,c.fullname contact,v.tagnumber,v.datesold,v.dateinservice,v4.carrier shippingmethod,v.shippingtrackingnumber,v.assetsid,v5.user_name created_by,v.creation_date,v6.user_name last_update_by,v.last_update_date
